column16: ["Welcome home to this bright and beautiful ground floor unit. This spacious one bedroom with ceramic tiles, wood floors, gas fireplace in this corner unit with large private patio for your BBQ's and entertaining. It comes with 1 parking and 1 storage locker. Just 2 blocks away from Main street with restaurants, shopping and transportation. First Showing at the open house Saturday & Sunday, April 23rd & 24th from 2-4 pm."]

["Unobstructed ocean & mountain views. Luxury, quality concrete building by Polygon, 2 bedroom + den and balcony home at UBC close to University of BC, University Hill Secondary School, Norma Rose Point Elementary school, public transit, Pacific Spirit Park and Botanical Gardens. New laminate flooring and wall paint renovated in Apr, 2016. Fireplace, open kitchen, Bosch appliances, granite countertops, 2 secured parking & 1 storage locker. Elegant 2-storey lobby, exercise room, concierge service. Must come and see! Open house: Apr 23 (Sat) & Apr 24 (Sun) 2 pm to 4 pm"]
["2 bedroom comfortable apartment unit located in the heart of Vancouver. Beautiful view of downtown and Northshore. Minutes away to Tinseltown, public bus and skytrain, GM Place, park and school."]

["Rentals 100% allowed. Gorgeous unobstructed POSTCARD view of North shore mountains. Well kept spacious 1 BR condo, a balcony, walking distance (5 minutes) to Joyce/Collingwood station. A Gym, Social room/Club house & underground secured parking. Playground, Tennis/basketball courts & 3 parks nearby. Close to Metrotown, Crystal Mall, Metropolis, Central Park, Kingsway. Perfect for Rental property/Investor, First time buyers, retirement & students."]

["The Lions is a prestigious Landmark complex consisting of two of the more architecturally interesting towers in Coal Harbour. Situated adjacent to Robson Street, Downtown and Coal Harbour, it is but a short walk to Stanley Park, shopping or theater going Downtown. With amazing amenities, bright southern exposure, efficient layout with ensuite storage and a locker room off the parkade. The suite itself is small, yes, but broad in features, with a quiet view over Albemi Street up to Robson, Down to Stanley Park, and up to downtown. Full Bath, Parking, Locker, In Suite Storage and full Kitchen, you have everything you need. Live or Rent, its up to you! Incredible value in today's market! (No Balcony). 3 Elevators, wheelchair access.", "The Lions is a prestigious Landmark complex consisting of two of the more architecturally interesting towers in Coal Harbour. Situated adjacent to Robson Street, Downtown and Coal Harbour, it is but a short walk to Stanley Park, shopping or theater going Downtown. With amazing amenities, bright southern exposure, efficient layout with ensuite storage and a locker room off the parkade. The suite itself is small, yes, but broad in features, with a quiet view over Albemi Street up to Robson, Down to Stanley Park, and up to downtown. Full Bath, Parking, Locker, In Suite Storage and full Kitchen, you have everything you need. Live or Rent, its up to you! Incredible value in today's market! (No Balcony), 3 Elevators, wheelchair access."]

["Welcome to the 21st floor of \u201CThe Park\u201D. Absolutely Prime Location with Iconic Vancouver views to English Bay, Stanley Park, Lost Lagoon, Coal Harbour and North Shore Mountains. This large 684 sq ft 1 bedroom plus sunroom, plus den is considered the best floorplan and position within this outstanding building. Walk straight out your door to access Stanley park, Coal Harbour, the West End, English Bay and all the amenities that make Vancouver great! This home has been tastefully updated and is move-in ready with engineered hardwood floors, stainless appliances, custom lighting, gas fireplace, floor to ceiling windows and modern decor. A private one car garage and adjoining storage locker is a great plus to make this a very executive home. This building is pet friendly and rentals are okay"]

["Well built concrete building by Intracorp at spectacular Chancellor Place in UBC across from multi-million estates. A rarely available NE facing unit with breathtaking views of mountain and ocean. Newly painted and carpeted. This 1 bedroom unit offers a well designed, spacious floor plan. Gourmet kitchen w/granite countertops and S/S appliances. Gas fireplace. 1 parking, 1 storage locker, large laundry room. In U-Hill school catchment, BC's top school,. A walk away from Chan Centre and UBC amenities. Great condition. Shows well. Move in ready!"]

["Collingwood/Joyce area. Bright spacious (2 bed + 2 baths) + den/solarium, Penthouse. Open concept, high ceiling with skylights. Granite countertops, fireplace, quality finishing, laminate hardwood floor. Steps to Joyce skytrain and quiet. Underground parking. Pets & rentals allowed. Open April 30th & May 1st, 2-4pm."]

["Look no further . . . Welcome to Glen Oaks: Boutique 8 unit building at Douglas Park on wonderfully situated at Oak & 21st. Come visit this updated large 670 SF 1 bedroom home with own entrance (Like a townhouse) and outdoor patio. This community building is better than new with a proud proactive ownership with all the major updates: Depreciation report 2013, Plumbing 2011, roof 2006, balcony membrane & painting 2014, new windows throughout 2016, NO Smoking building. Maintenance fees include heat, hot water & laundry too! 1 dog or 2 cats 1 rental allowed. 1 parking & 1 secured storage. Option to install W/D, steps to VGH, groceries, restaurants and parks. Book your private viewing today. OH Sat/Sun, April 23/24, 2-4pm. 1st showing Wed Apr.20 12-1pm", "Look no further . . . Welcome to Glen Oaks: Boutique 8 unit building at Douglas Park on wonderfully situated at Oak & 21st. Come visit this updated large 670 SF 1 bedroom home with own entrance (Like a townhouse) and outdoor patio. This community building is better than new with a proud proactive ownership with all the major updates: Depreciation report 2013, Plumbing 2011, roof 2006, balcony membrane & painting 2014, new windows throughout 2016, NO Smoking building. Maintenance fees include heat, hot water & laundry too! 1 dog or 2 cats 1 rental allowed. 1 parking & 1 secured storage. Option to install W/D, steps to VGH, groceries, restaurants and parks. Book your private viewing today. OH Sat/Sun, April 23/24, 2-4pm. 1st showing Wed Apr.20 12-1pm"]

["Spectacular Ocean, Beach and Sunset views with sunny southern exposure are to be enjoyed from this exceptional waterfront home. Luxury living at its best with only one unit on a floor in the exclusive Eugenia Place. The private elevator lobby opens to 2,679 Sq.Ft of luxurious living with 3 Bedrooms, 3 Baths, Den with custom mahogany cabinets, entertainment-size living and dining rooms, Solarium with wet bar & large laundry room, 3 decks, 3 parkings, storage. Hot yoga sauna room, exercise room and a grand foyer, live-in caretaker. Bring your decorating idea for this one of a kind unit just outside Stanley Park and English Bay Beach. The Best location for watching the fireworks from your room and balcony."]

["Welcome to Sails: One of the Village on False Creeks higher end developments. With full access to the Gold medal club this 860~ sq foot large 1 bed and den is perfect for that young professional or couple looking to purchase and live comfortably. Featuring over height ceilings, high end Sub Zero and Miele appliances this 1 bedroom lives spaciously with dual vanity sinks in the ensuite with separate shower and bath tub. Full access to the exclusive gold medal club offers indoor pools, hot tub , sauna , steam and change rooms, with a fitness facility ontop of the gym you have in your very own building. Open houses April 19th 10-12pm , April 23 and 24 from 12-4pm.", "Welcome to Sails: One of the Village on False Creeks higher end developments. With full access to the Gold medal club this 860~ sq foot large 1 bed and den is perfect for that young professional or couple looking to purchase and live comfortably. Featuring over height ceilings, high end Sub Zero and Miele appliances this 1 bedroom lives spaciously with dual vanity sinks in the ensuite with separate shower and bath tub. Full access to the exclusive gold medal club offers indoor pools, hot tub , sauna , steam and change rooms, with a fitness facility ontop of the gym you have in your very own building. Open houses April 19th 10-12pm , April 23 and 24 from 12-4pm."]

["Rarely available, one-of-a kind, Full Floor unit of 2,605 sf at The Grace Residences. 3 Bed + 3 Bath + Den. The Open plan features Hardwood, Marble and Tile flooring throughout, high end appliances & finishings, wine fridge, private elevator access w/ fingerprint security opening up directly into your suite. True floor-to-ceiling windows offering 360 degree views of Mountains, False Creek, English Bay and Downtown Vancouver. Enjoy sunrises and sunsets from 2 large balconies, North & South facing, a rarity in the City! 3 parking stalls & Storage Locker included. Showing by Appointment Only."]

["R+ R by Polygon, a boutique collection of riverside residences in Vancouver's River District. This coveted south facing 2 bed, 2 bath home features bedrooms at opposite ends of the residence to maximize privacy and tranquility. Ensuite boasts a walk-in rain shower with integrated bench seating, double vanities and a convenient linen closet. The kitchen sparkles with brand name appliances and marble accents. As the River District continues to blossom, new grocers, banks, cafes and parks will also be coming soon. Sales Centre is located at 3202 Riverwalk Ave. just off of Kinross Street."]

["West-side living at its best in the brand-new \"Granville at 70th\" building by Westbank, Canada's leading luxury developer. This three-bedroom-plus-den home has great natural light coming through its floor-to-ceiling windows. Unobstructed water views are visible from this open living space. The floor plan features three bedrooms with three bathrooms and a den with windows right off of the kitchen. Top-of-the-line finishing options include Miele appliances (including washer / dryer), walnut-engineered hardwood floors, heated marble floors in bathrooms, and much more. The building amenities include a 24-hour concierge, gym, theatre room, steam room, lounge, and three meeting rooms."]

["Bright and well kept (by first owner) 2 bedroom/ 2 bathroom Penthouse (9 feet ceiling) at Glenlloyd Park by Polygon. This NW facing unit has a great view of beautifully landscaped courtyard. Private and quiet. Open kitchen with maple cabinet, granite counter top, stainless steel appliances. Best school catchment University Hill Elementary & High School. Enjoy all the programs and amenities of UBC campus. Steps to shopping, parks & bus loop and UBC main campus. No UBC service levy. No rental restriction."]

["Welcome to the Chatham! Concrete highrise. Bright and spacious 786 sf south east 1 bedroom with open den. Enjoy a beautiful outlook to gardens and forest view from your spacious balcony. Well maintained suite, will newer engineered hardwood flooring and cozy gas fireplace in your living room. Fabulous amenities includes, lovely gardens, indoor pool, jacuzzi, sauna, fitness studio, lounge with pool table and library, guest suite, visitor parking and live in manager. Pet and rental friendly. 2 side by side parking and 1 locker. Tranquil lifestyle, being steps to trails, parks, recreation, but also having all the conveniences at your doorstep of shopping, restaurants, recreation, transit and UBC. By appointment only.", "Welcome to the Chatham! Concrete highrise. Bright and spacious 786 sf south east 1 bedroom with open den. Enjoy a beautiful outlook to gardens and forest view from your spacious balcony. Well maintained suite, will newer engineered hardwood flooring and cozy gas fireplace in your living room. Fabulous amenities includes, lovely gardens, indoor pool, jacuzzi, sauna, fitness studio, lounge with pool table and library, guest suite, visitor parking and live in manager. Pet and rental friendly. 2 side by side parking and 1 locker. Tranquil lifestyle, being steps to trails, parks, recreation, but also having all the conveniences at your doorstep of shopping, restaurants, recreation, transit and UBC. By appointment only."]

["LUXURY, LOCATION, LIFESTYLE. A truly exceptional home situated in one of Downtown's most highly sought after communities, Beach Crescent. Stunning, South exposed corner suite w/ floor to ceiling windows & an absolutely exceptional layout. Open concept kitchen/living/dining area is ideal for entertaining & boasts breakfast bar, S/S appliances & gas stove. Separated bedrooms, master has double closets w/ ensuite bathroom. Fantastic den perfect for a home office. Custom closets throughout, upgraded flooring, paint, faucets, crown moulding, baseboards, master tub & so much more. Large insuite storage. Suite overlooks lush green garden & blossoming trees. Resort Style amenities at Club Viva & a phenomenal waterfront location right on Seawall & George Wainborn park. Open Sat 2-4 & Sun 1-3.", "LUXURY, LOCATION, LIFESTYLE. A truly exceptional home situated in one of Downtown's most highly sought after communities, Beach Crescent. Stunning, South exposed corner suite w/ floor to ceiling windows & an absolutely exceptional layout. Open concept kitchen/living/dining area is ideal for entertaining & boasts breakfast bar, S/S appliances & gas stove. Separated bedrooms, master has double closets w/ ensuite bathroom. Fantastic den would make a perfect home office. Custom closets throughout, upgraded flooring, paint, faucets, crown moulding, baseboards, master tub & so much more. Large insuite storage. Suite overlooks lush green garden & blossoming trees. Resort Style amenities at Club Viva & a phenomenal waterfront location right on Seawall & George Wainborn park. Must be seen! Open Sat 2-4PM & Sun 1-3PM."]

["The Lions Best Location in Vancouver Downtown. 1 Bedroom + Den (has window and can be another bedroom) with some Coal Harbour Water and Mountain View! Great open concept layout with hardwood floors. Ensuite Storage. 1 parking and 1 storage. Open Houses: Sat & Sun, April 23rd & 24th, 2-4 PM."]

["PANORAMIC WATER & CITY VIEWS from this absolutely breathtaking home in False Creek's Brighton by BOSA. Corner suite w/ floor to ceiling windows providing the most sought after direct views of DT, False Creek & NShore Mtns. Unbelievable amount of living space - over 1350 sqft + large balcony. Two spacious bedrooms with Master that boasts mountain views, walk-in closet & large ensuite bathroom. Huge den would make a perfect nursery, guest space, wine room or home office with a view. Upgraded flooring, paint, bathroom countertops & sinks, dishwasher and roller blinds. 2 prkg + storage locker. Brighton is an excellent building w/ gym, meeting room & pool. Steps to Seawall, parks & the convenience of Olympic Village & Chinatown. Sneak peek Thurs 5:30-6:30, Open Sun 2-4 or call to view!", "PANORAMIC WATER & CITY VIEWS from this absolutely breathtaking home in False Creek's Brighton by BOSA. From almost anywhere you stand, this corner suite with floor to ceiling windows provides one of Vancouver\u2019s most sought after views of DT, False Creek and westerly sunsets. Unbelievable amount of interior living space measuring over 1300sqft with a large balcony. 2 great sized bedrooms plus a spacious den - perfect for a nursery, guest quarters, wine room, or home office with a view. Master boasts mountain views, walk-in closet & large ensuite bathroom with tub & shower. Upgraded flooring, paint, bathroom countertops & sinks, dishwasher and roller blinds. 2 prkg + storage locker. Brighton is an excellent building with gym, meeting room & pool. Steps to the Seawall, countless parks and all the conveniences of Olympic Village & Chinatown. Sure to take your breath away! Sneak Peek, Thursday 5:30-6:30, Open House Sunday 2-4 or call to view!"]

["Ideally situated at the centre of Greater Vancouver, R+R by Polygon features a limited collection of 99 riverside residences. This spacious 2-bed home if filled with designer details including a gourmet kitchen with Bosch appliances and marble accents, generous storage and closet spaces, and a spa-style rain shower with integrated seating. Steps from lush green spaces, cycling paths, riverside walkways and a pier. Retail and restaurants are also coming soon. Sales Centre is located at 3202 Riverwalk Ave just off Kinross Street."]

["Welcome to Espana! This North facing 2 bed + solarium corner unit is sure to impress! Features include an efficient floor plan, expansive floor to ceiling windows for plenty of natural light, stainless steel appliances, separate wine cooler/fridge & sleek granite countertops throughout. Enjoy and take in the STUNNING VIEWS of the North Shore mountain, water & city from every room in this home! Amenities include an indoor swimming pool, sauna/steam room & gym. AMAZING location with a walkscore of 98! Steps to the skytrain, various bus routes, Costco, T&T Supermarket, BC Place, Rogers Arena, Chinatown, Gastown, seawall, downtown core & so much more. 1 parking stall included. Call today for a private showing. OPEN HOUSE: Saturday & Sunday, April 23rd/24th, 2-4pm."]

["Quiet & peaceful garden view apartment in the heart of the city! Welcome to \"Electric Avenue\" built by Bosa - This roomy 1 bedroom & DEN + private balcony includes 1 PARKING spot, open concept kitchen, granite counter tops, insuite laundry, walk-through closet & stainless steel appliances. Enjoy 2 charming garden courtyards, concierge service, a private theatre room & fitness centre. Step outside your front door and you'll find the ScotiaBank Theatres, Earls, Starbucks, Tim Hortons, and more. With a 'Walk Score' of 99 you can walk, bike or skytrain anywhere within minutes. Perfect for first time home buyers or investors. Don't miss out - call/text for a private viewing. OPEN HOUSE Sunday April 24th from 3:00PM to 5:00PM."]

["Rarely available '07' 1 bedroom & den condo in the luxury concrete tower, Raffles on Robson. Extremely well managed building, high end appliances/fixtures, gas range. Sleek 'New York' style tiled bathrooms with separate shower/tub & rain shower head. Gorgeous city & corridor water views of False Creek from the generous sized West facing balcony. Located within the entertainment/tech & library district, trendy restaurants & eateries, cafes, shopping, BC Place, IGA & transit. Fitness Centre, hot tub, concierge & bike room. Perfect for investors as Raffles attracts top quality tenants. One parking stall included. Open Fri 1030-noon & Apr 23/24th Sat/Sun 2-4pm."]

["Ideally situated at the centre of Greater Vancouver, R+R by Polygon features a limited collection of 99 riverside residences. This spacious 2-bed home is filled with designer details including a gourmet kitchen with Bosch appliances and marble accents, generous storage and closet spaces and a spa-style rainshower with integrated seating. Steps from lush green spaces, cycling paths, riverside walkways and a pier. Retail and restaurants are also coming soon. Sales Centre is located at 3202 Riverwalk Ave just off of Kinross Street."]

["Welcome to Academy by Polygon in the boutique community of Westbrook Village at UBC! This nearly-new 2 Bed+2 Full Bath home is situated within walking distance to the University campus,with easy access to Shopping, Transit, Campus Amentities and the Trails of Pacific Spirit Park. Enjoy this Bright Corner unit with park and forest views, contemporary finishes, European bathrooms & a Deluxe Kitchen with Premium Appliances.", "Welcome to Academy by Polygon in the boutique community of Westbrook Village at UBC! This nearly-new 2 Bed+2 Full Bath home is situated within walking distance to the University campus,with easy access to Shopping, Transit, Campus Amentities and the Trails of Pacific Spirit Park. Enjoy this Bright Corner unit with park and forest views, contemporary finishes, European bathrooms & a Deluxe Kitchen with Premium Appliances."]

["Ideally situated at the centre of Greater Vancouver, R&R by Polygon features a limited collection of 99 riverside residences. This spacious 2 bed home is filled with designer details including a gourmet kitchen with Bosch appliances & marble accents, generous storage & closet spaces & a spa-style rain shower with integrated seating. Steps from lush green spaces, cycling paths, riverside walkways & a pier. Retail & restaurants are also coming soon. Sales centre is located at 3202 Riverwalk Ave, just off of Kinross Street."]
